channel.title: Strike Force Heroes on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Strike Force Heroes on Game6r

item.title: Game Strike Force Heroes 2 - Stars in Action
item.description: An interesting twist awaits the gamer at the very beginning. After all, the game offers him a choice of character: Obama or McCain! And after that, it will be necessary, no less, to save the world from terrorism with the direct participation of one of the politicians. Third person view. Moving from screen to screen, kill all the terrorists, collect weapons and ammo. You can bring down people and even birds.
